faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: You have questions? We have answers.

items.q: How is the Foodbrain different from a human dietitian?
items.a: The Foodbrain provides personalized meal plans based on your unique data, offering instant results at a fraction of the cost of traditional dietitians.

items.q: Is my personal data safe with Foodbrain?
items.a: Yes, we prioritize your privacy and use advanced security measures to protect your data. We do not share your information with third parties without your consent.

items.q: Can I customize my meal plan further after receiving it?
items.a: Absolutely! You can adjust your preferences and regenerate your meal plan anytime to better suit your evolving needs.

items.q: What if I have dietary restrictions or allergies?
items.a: During the onboarding process, you can specify any dietary restrictions or allergies, and the AI will tailor your meal plan accordingly.

items.q: How often should I update my information for the best results?
items.a: We recommend updating your information every few months or whenever there are significant changes in your lifestyle or health goals.

banner.title: Cookie Settings
banner.description: We use cookies to enhance your experience, analyze site traffic, and personalize content. You can customize your preferences or accept all cookies.
banner.descriptionEU: We value your privacy. Under GDPR, we need your consent to use non-essential cookies. You have full control over your data and can change your preferences at any time.
banner.euNotice: Under GDPR, you have the right to control your data. You can withdraw consent at any time through Cookie Settings in the footer.

modal.title: Cookie Preferences
modal.description: We respect your privacy. Choose which cookies you're comfortable with. You can change these settings at any time.
modal.confirmWithdraw: Are you sure you want to withdraw all cookie consent? This will disable all non-essential cookies and you'll need to provide consent again to use certain features.

essential.title: Essential Cookies
essential.description: Required for the website to function properly. These cannot be disabled as they're necessary for security, authentication, and basic features.

functional.title: Functional Cookies
functional.description: Enable enhanced functionality and personalization, such as language preferences and UI customization.

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.description: Help us understand how visitors interact with our website by collecting and reporting information anonymously.

marketing.title: Marketing Cookies
marketing.description: Used to track visitors across websites to display relevant and engaging advertisements tailored to your interests.
